project_overview.name: Bold Canvas Studio
project_overview.purpose: Portfolio and marketing website for a creative studio specializing in branding, websites, and digital experiences

tech_stack.styling: Tailwind CSS with custom design system

project_overview.current_state: Fully functional, cleaned, and production-ready after recent audit and stabilization work

main_sections.role: Landing section with headline, rotating words animation, CTA buttons, and image collage
About section with main statement and side note (editorial layout, static text)
Scrolling text banner with service keywords
Interactive collage grid linking to project case studies
Portfolio grid displaying selected projects with links to case studies
Service offerings with interactive tabs and visual display
Studio philosophy and values with numbered bullets and CTA
Contact section with email CTA and disabled brief form button

desktop.logo: Links to home, scrolls to top

mobile.panel: Slide-in left panel with navigation and CTA

pages.home: Index.tsx - Main landing page with all sections
pages.project_case: ProjectCase.tsx - Individual project case study pages

header_ctas.action: Navigate to home (/) and scroll to top

collage_showcase_links.implementation: Link components mapped to project IDs

footer_links.action: Scroll to top (Home) or smooth scroll to sections

footer_links.status: Intentionally placeholder - no actual social URLs

mobile_menu.navigation: Buttons that scroll to sections and close menu
mobile_menu.cta: Start a project button (scrolls to #contact and closes menu)

header.mobile: Hamburger menu button visible, desktop nav hidden

hero.xl_screens: Badge 'New' visible next to CTA buttons (no overlap)

storytelling.mobile: Note moves below main text (static positioning)
storytelling.desktop: 80/20 layout with note positioned absolutely bottom-right

portfolio.desktop: Two column grid with large items spanning 2 rows

capabilities.desktop: Two column with interactive visual display on right

general.typography: Fluid typography with clamp() and responsive classes

hero.rotating_word: Fade in with 3D rotation when word changes (every 3s)
hero.collage_images: Fade in with scale and translate (staggered explosion effect)

scroll_animations.fade_up: Elements with data-animate='fade-up' fade in from bottom
scroll_animations.scale: Elements with data-animate='scale' scale in from 0.9
scroll_animations.stagger: Containers with data-animate='stagger' animate children sequentially
scroll_animations.parallax: Elements with data-parallax attribute have scroll-linked movement

css_animations.sticker_bounce: Infinite bounce animation for sticker elements (3s cycle)
css_animations.marquee: Continuous horizontal scroll for marquee text
css_animations.link_underline: Hover underline animation for navigation links

interactive_effects.hover_states: Scale, translate, and opacity changes on cards and buttons
interactive_effects.magnetic_buttons: CSS-based hover effects (no JS magnetic effect currently)
